column3: Connection to the game server could not be established.
Connection to the game server was lost.
The server has kicked us from the game (%(error_code)s).\n\n%(reason)s
An unexpected network error has occured and your connection has been lost. Error Code: %(error_code)s
Failed to connect to game server. You appear to be running an outdated game client. Please download the latest version and try again.
Failed to connect to game server. You appear to be running an outdated game client. Please download the latest version and try again.
Failed to connect to game server.\nThere are currently no server shards available.
